testsuite.system-out: Creating jsonArray by adding POJO_Class_02 object one by one in order to use it as Payload in the next TestCase
Creating jsonArray by adding POJO_Class_02 object one by one in order to use it as Payload in the next TestCase

The Status code of the HttpResponse received against Http-Post request having JsonArray as Payload is same as expected : 201 ResponseBody received : [{"firstName":"Mahesh","lastName":"Singh","gender":"Male","age":"32.0","salary":"25000.0"},{"firstName":"Rajat","lastName":"Singh","gender":"Male","age":"28.0","salary":"55000.0"}]
